channel.title: How do I make mining copper unmassable

item.title: How do I make mining copper unmassable
item.dc:creator: @bjc22 bjc22
item.description:
@bjc22 wrote:

It still masses…

So nobody has a clue why?

item.title: How do I make mining copper unmassable
item.dc:creator: @bjc22 bjc22
item.description:
@bjc22 wrote:

All the rocks you cant mass except for tin and copper. Here is my mining code:

if(objectID == 450) { message("There is no ore on this rock!"); } if(objectID == 2094 && objectX == 2659 && objectY == 3305) { if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1275 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1265 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1267 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1269 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1271 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1273) { if (GoodDistance(objectX, objectY, absX, absY, 1) == true) { actionAmount++; actionTimer = 10; pickAxe(); message("You manage to get the ore"); addItem(Item.randomTinOre(), 1); addSkillXP(50 + playerLevel[14], 14); deleteObj(objectX,objectY); Object(objectX,objectY,450,-1,10); aTimer = 21; emoteTimer = 3; isMining = true; TurnPlayerTo(objectX,objectY); } }else{ message("You need a pickaxe to mine!"); } } else if(objectID == 2094 && objectX == 2659 && objectY == 3304) { if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1275 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1265 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1267 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1269 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1271 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1273) { if (GoodDistance(objectX, objectY, absX, absY, 1) == true) { actionAmount++;
